resources.string: Delete contacts on UIM card complete.
Import contacts from UIM card complete.
To import contacts via UIM card, turn off Airplane mode.
Your UIM card capacity is full, can not import new contacts. Please clear the UIM card and try again.
The UIM contact is already existing.
Error occurs when searching UIM card contacts
Loading UIM contacts, please wait for a mement…
Reading UIM card information (may take a minute)…
Position %1$d on UIM card is not valid, should between %2$d and %3$d
Your UIM card can store %d contacts, Are you sure you want to proceed?

"\"You don't have any contacts to display.
To add contacts, press "Menu" and touch:
"
Accounts" to add or configure an account with contacts you can sync to the phone "" "
New contact" to create a new contact from scratch "" "
Import/Export" to import contacts from your UIM or SD card ""\" "

"\"You don't have any contacts to display. (If you just added an account, it can take a few minutes to sync contacts.)
To add contacts, press "Menu" and touch:
"
Accounts" to add or configure an account with contacts you can sync to the phone "" "
Display options" to change which contacts are visible "" "
New contact" to create a new contact from scratch "" "
Import/Export" to import contacts from your UIM or SD card ""\" "
